about_the_game:
You become a ghost and use various methods to scare away the ghost investigators who come to your house.
Surprise, attack, curse. You can do it any way you like.
You can scare them any way you like, and later replay the replay from the investigator's point of view to see what kind of ghost you were.
You can keep chasing back investigators to raise your level,
Or you can explore how to make a scary replay video,
You can play in any way you like.

・The game starts in the first-person perspective.
・Some threats are made using a microphone.
・Keyboard and mouse controls
・Keyboard and mouse are used to control the game.

*Notes
・The investigator's name and voice are set at random.
・The replay function saves data using the multiplayer function, so in rare cases, due to lag or other reasons, the replay results may be different from the results of the play.
　Please understand that this may occur depending on the environment.
・This game has flashing lights.
　If you are sensitive to light, stop the game and consult a doctor if you feel any physical problems.
